import os

def copy(source_path, sink_path):
    if source_path is None or sink_path is None:
        raise ValueError("Source and target paths must not be null")
    if not os.path.exists(source_path):
        raise IOError("Source file does not exist")
    if not os.path.isfile(source_path):
        raise IOError("Source file is not a regular file")
    if not os.access(source_path, os.R_OK):
        raise IOError("Source file can not be read (missing access right)")
    if not os.path.exists(sink_path):
        raise IOError("Target file does not exist")
    if not os.path.isfile(sink_path):
        raise IOError("Target file is not a regular file")
    if not os.access(sink_path, os.W_OK):
        raise IOError("Target file is write protected")
    with open(source_path, 'rb') as source, open(sink_path, 'wb') as sink:
        while source.peek():
            sink.write(source.read(1024))
